tool_description: Processes payment transactions through selected gateways with comprehensive error handling and status tracking.

gateway_id.description: Identifier of the payment gateway to use

transaction_amount.description: Transaction amount in base currency units

capture_immediately.description: Whether to capture payment immediately or authorize only

error_messages: Gateway unavailable: Selected payment gateway is currently unavailable
Invalid payment token: Payment method token is invalid or expired
Insufficient funds: Customer has insufficient funds for transaction
Transaction declined: Payment was declined by issuer or gateway
Duplicate transaction: Transaction with same parameters already processed
Invalid amount: Transaction amount must be greater than zero
usage: Provide all required transaction parameters including gateway_id, amount details, payment_method_token, and party identifiers. Set capture_immediately to false for authorization-only transactions.
